bio: C24Reborn Is Indonesia's Cryptocurrency Community, Since 2019. We Discuss Airdrop
contributionDescription: I contribute to advertising, promotion of YouTube content and everything that is useful for the progress of the ecosystem and community, I participate in various events such as Galxe and others. impressed and good I like the features offered by the team, as a user I feel very comfortable and confident that this project can reach the expected point together!
impactDescription: I contribute to advertising, promotion of YouTube content and everything that is useful for the progress of the ecosystem and community, I participate in various events such as Galxe and others. impressed and good I like the features offered by the team, as a user I feel very comfortable and confident that this project can reach the expected point together!
pwFlaggedReason: Yes, this application should be flagged for violating the rules of the grant program. The contribution description and impact description imply that the applicant uses the grant to promote and advertise, which is against rule 6. Advertising - Using RetroPGF application to showcase something you are selling like a token sale or NFT drop.
recategorizeReason: NO, the application is incorrectly categorized. This seems more like a PROJECT application due to references made to a community and ecosystem, even though 'I' is used.
